definition: to survey/to view broadly
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
as far as the eye can see

sentences.english: Her eyes moved gradually out into the velvet dusk .
sentences.chinese: 她渐渐放眼去看那天鹅绒般的暮色。

sentences.english: Cozy rooms look out over the district.
sentences.chinese: 放眼望去，都是舒适的房间。

sentences.english: Look closely, a horizontal rail in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 放眼望去，一条条铁路纵横在我眼前。

sentences.english: As far as I know, more and more people have the same experience like my grandma.
sentences.chinese: 放眼水木，很难再找到赞同他的人了。

sentences.english: Looking to the future, broad-minded, with wisdom creates value.
sentences.chinese: 放眼未来，胸襟开阔，用智慧创造价值。

sentences.english: We expect to manage contemporary Taiwan's art and further develop to international art markets.
sentences.chinese: 期盼能落实经营当代台湾艺术，进而放眼国际。

sentences.english: The natural landscape in this region is generally marshy and well watered.
sentences.chinese: 放眼望去，这片区域是沼泽而富水丰沃的。

sentences.english: Dragonstone was still visible above the grasslands.
sentences.chinese: 从草原上放眼望去，龙石山依然看得见。

sentences.english: If you look around the world, it's the same kind of thing.
sentences.chinese: 放眼全球，情况大同小异。

sentences.english: Looking at the domestic furnishings industry, product category after another, a variety of styles.
sentences.chinese: 放眼国内家饰行业，产品种类层出不穷，风格多样。

sentences.english: China is leading the steel industry in the world because of its huge quantity of production.
sentences.chinese: 中国的钢铁行业即使放眼世界是在数量上遥遥领先的。

sentences.english: Standing on the field side, everywhere we look, bumper harvests.
sentences.chinese: 站在田野边，放眼望去，到处是丰收的景象。

sentences.english: You have to obviously have aglobal perspective.
sentences.chinese: 你显然需要有放眼全球的眼光。

sentences.english: At this time looking into the sky, in my heart you flow rainbow will bloom.
sentences.chinese: 此时放眼望去，天空的流虹便将会在心底油然绽放。

sentences.english: The young people should keep the Motherland in mind and look to the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 当代青年应该胸怀祖国，放眼世界。

definition: panoramic view/wide survey
to survey comprehensively/an overall survey
to turn up one's nose/to show disdain for/to regard superciliously
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
to be equal to/to be well-matched/rival
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
to be shoulder to shoulder/to be on an equal level with/Taiwan pr. [bi4 jian1]
rare/infrequent
person of outstanding talent
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
current/present/now/nowadays
lit. to proclaim oneself hegemon/to take a leading role/to build a personal fiefdom
lit. walking alone/prominent/unrivalled/outstanding
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/just a handful/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
to shake up/to deal a shock/(fig.) to stir (sb's heart)
a crane in a flock of chicken (idiom); way above the common/manifestly superior
